abilities.name: Glitch.Pop
abilities.description: Launch a glitch orb that grows as it travels. The orb bursts on recast or max range, hitting enemies away from its center point.

abilities.name: Cyber Swipe
abilities.description: Blink to a location. On arrival, swipe enemies in an arc with your tail.

abilities.name: Firewall Sentry
abilities.description: Summon a turret that launches a firewall of technostatic in a fixed direction. Each bolt hits the first enemy struck.

abilities.name: Barrier Beam
abilities.description: Create a barrier while firing a blast that knocks away enemies near its center but deals a LIGHT hit to others. The barrier deals LIGHT hits and breaks when it touches an enemy. If cast on your side of the field, the barrier is larger and unbreakable.

abilities.name: Breakthrough
abilities.description: Gain a defensive buff and charge forward, stopping on the first enemy hit and knocking nearby enemies back. The buff grants 30% knockback resistance and 25% damage reduction for 5s but loses its effects if you are staggered.

abilities.name: Pathsplitter
abilities.description: Combine both shields and launch them forward. If they hit an enemy, they expand into a slow-moving, destructible barrier that can repeatedly hit enemies. Deals reduced damage after the first hit.

abilities.name: Astral Projection
abilities.description: Launch a decelerating arc barrier that deals a single hit to each enemy it collides with.

abilities.name: Cosmic Expanse
abilities.description: Construct an expanding ring of light that quickly vanishes. The ring will persist and begin to shrink if it hits any enemies, dealing subsequent hits to enemies who collide with it.

abilities.name: Celestial Intervention
abilities.description: Summon a celestial guardian that continuously heals nearby allies. The guardian rescues any ally that would be K.O.'d, transporting them to its location and restoring 25% of their Stagger bar

abilities.name: Lock and Load
abilities.description: Blast nearby enemies with a powerful cone of energy that extends into LIGHT hit bullets. 2 charges.

abilities.name: Xeno Cloak
abilities.description: Become invisible and gain 50% Speed for 1s.

abilities.name: Molten Bolt
abilities.description: Launch a sticky bomb that hits and burns the first enemy struck for 2.5s, slowing and damaging them over time. The effect can spread to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Rollout
abilities.description: Wind up and roll a decelerating bamboo log that hits and breaks on the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Somerassault
abilities.description: Roll in a direction. At max range or on impact with an enemy, smash nearby enemies, stunning them.

abilities.name: Tofu Fortress
abilities.description: Serve up an arc of tofu plates that hit enemies and leave impassable terrain where they end.

abilities.name: Bewitching Beam
abilities.description: Bewitch allies and enemies in a line. Enemies are reduced in Size, Speed, and Power. Allies gain Size and Power.

abilities.name: Flutter Fly
abilities.description: Empower nearby allies with 60% Speed that decays over 2.5s

abilities.name: Magic Maelstrom
abilities.description: Conjure a growing maelstrom. On recast or after a few seconds, launch the maelstrom, hitting all enemies in its path. If released before full size, it has reduced range and deals LIGHT hits.

abilities.name: Piercing Shot
abilities.description: Take aim and unleash crystalline energy at all enemies in a long line.

abilities.name: Rose Warp
abilities.description: Blink to a nearby location, then fire a crystal thorn at the nearest enemy.

abilities.name: Crystal Thorns
abilities.description: Fire a volley of LIGHT [hit] crystal thorns in an arc.

abilities.name: Misdirection
abilities.description: Launch a decelerating projectile that hits the first enemy struck. After reaching its apex, it rapidly reverses course and hits harder.

abilities.name: Double Take
abilities.description: Deploy a poof of smoke at a target location, dealing a LIGHT hit to enemies and causing them to take 30% more damage from all sources for 4s.

abilities.name: Big Finish
abilities.description: Conjure a gravity well at a target location, slowing and pulling enemies towards its center point. After 2.25s or upon recast, the well explodes, hitting enemies away.

abilities.name: Fiery Fist
abilities.description: Punch all enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Flying Pheonix
abilities.description: Dash in a direction, hitting all enemies in your path. Other abilities can be cast while dashing.

abilities.name: Flame Flurry
abilities.description: Deal a flurry of light jabs in an arc, culminating in [a] devastating roundhouse kick.

abilities.name: Friend Fling
abilities.description: Launch a blob that hits the first enemy struck and spawns a blob on impact or max range.

abilities.name: Blob Bounce
abilities.description: Spawn a blob at your feet and hop to a location, becoming Elusive while airborne. Elusive targets are invulnerable and untargetable.

abilities.name: Make it Rain
abilities.description: Target an area and launch a massive blob cluster into the sky. After a delay the cluster splits, raining down blobs for each enemy in the target area, plus one at the center.

abilities.name: Barrage
abilities.description: Launch a barrage of LIGHT [hitting] fireballs in a direction.

abilities.name: Blazing Pace
abilities.description: Gain 35% Speed for 4s

abilities.name: Giga Blast
abilities.description: Launch a blazing fireball that detonates on impact with an enemy or wall, hitting enemies away from the blast's center point.

abilities.name: W.H.A.M.M.Y.
abilities.description: Fire a rocket that deals a LIGHT hit on early impact. After a brief delay, it accelerates and hits much harder.

abilities.name: B.O.O.S.T.
abilities.description: Launch in a direction with limited ability to steer, only stopping upon collision with an enemy or terrain.

abilities.name: C.R.A.T.E.R.
abilities.description: Drop a bomb at a location, hitting surrounding enemies. Enemies at the center are hit much harder.

abilities.name: Sonic Boom
abilities.description: Launch a sonic wave that hits all enemies it passes through and slows them for 1s. Deals LIGHT hits to subsequent enemies.

abilities.name: Flow State
abilities.description: Gain a 30% Speed for 2.25s, increasing by 2% per second. Hitting anything refreshes the duration, scaling infinitely.

abilities.name: Bass Drop
abilities.description: After a delay, emit 5 sound pulses at surrounding enemies over 2.5s.

abilities.name: Pendulum Swing
abilities.description: Slam your chain sickle from overhead, in a direction. Enemies hit near max range are hit much harder.

abilities.name: Whiplash
abilities.description: Gain 35% Speed for 2.25s. Within the next 2.25s, recast to deal a LIGHT hit to surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Unstable Anomaly
abilities.description: Conjure an expanding anomaly. If it reaches maximum size, it solidifies and continually hits enemies away from it. Otherwise, it dissipates on hitting an enemy.

abilities.name: Shadow Swap
abilities.description: On round start, place your shadow at your location. On cast, become Elusive and quickly travel to your shadow's location, swapping places with it and leaving an Unstable Anomaly from where you departed.

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Launch a shadow wave that banishes, slows, and damages enemies for 1.75s. Banished enemies cannot be targeted or interacted with.

abilities.name: Power Chord
abilities.description: Launch a lightning riff, hitting and slowing the first enemy struck before chaining LIGHT hits to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Thunderstruck
abilities.description: Summon a thunderbolt from the sky to a target location, hitting and stunning enemies for 0.75s. For the next 3.25s, recast to assume a form of pure energy and teleport to the cast location.

abilities.name: Super Nova
abilities.description: Push-and-hold this ability to start rocking out, gaining 100% knockback resistance. Upon releasing the ability or after 2s, emit a shockwave that blasts enemies away from you. The wave increases in size and power for the first 1.25s it's charged.

abilities.name: Bell Ringer
abilities.description: Swing your arms wildly, knocking away enemies near max range but dealing a LIGHT hit to those closer to the center.

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.description: Wind up and rush in a direction, hitting enemies in your path.

abilities.name: X Maximus!
abilities.description: Hulk out for 3.5s, increasing your Size and upgrading your Strikes to harder and work against players.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.description: Deal a LIGHT hit in a small arc, followed by a larger slash that hits enemies in the center.

abilities.name: Iai Rush
abilities.description: Blink in a line after a delay, hitting all enemies along your travel path.

abilities.name: Oni's Blade
abilities.description: Blink to a nearby location and become Elusive, repeatedly dealing LIGHT hits to enemies caught in the area. Afterwards, hit all nearby enemies away.
